course_annotation:
Today, Python is actively used in creating real programs. the course teaches
students how to work professionally with classes. students will learn how to work
with relational and non-relational databases. Learn how to create GUI programs in
Python. The course will introduce students to parallel programming and data
science.Sstudents will learn effective and safe manipulation of data.
purpose:
Te goal of the course is to introduce students to how to use Python to create real
programs. Another important goal of the course is to introduce students to how to
work with databases and GUIs using Python. The goalof the course is to teach
students data science in Python. Also, the purpose of the course is to teach students
how to use classes in Python when programming.
literature: The Python Standard Library by Example Doug Hellmann 2017
